CRISPResso2
===========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which CRISPResso2 installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using CRISPResso2, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load CRISPResso2/2.3.1-foss-2023b
```
